author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Pretty nice micro build
review:
Opening -

The snowspeeder is one of the original trilogys most iconic vehicles and Lego has produced many renditions of the craft .

The build-

The build is simplistic but affective certain elements make this build look accurate the 1×4 bars and binoculars make for very nice forward cannons and harpoon and tow cable .

In conclusion-

this is a very nice little build perhaps my personal nostalgia has an influence on my opinion but I do think it is good . It is very much a shame that the magazine AT-AT looks so atrocious they could have looked great next to each other .
